name: Bots & Belts
storyline: The future of manufacturing is here! But, as an overworked robot in a toy factory, the future certainly doesn't seem very bright. Your job is simple: assemble toys from parts and do not allow incomplete items to reach the end of the line! Together with your friends, try to fulfill all the orders accurately and in a timely fashion. If you get overwhelmed, try halting the production line!
summary: Bots & Belts is a game about a robot stuck in a toy factory. The player is tasked with building various toys from parts that must be manipulated to satisfy the orders you are provided. The game can be played solo, with friends online, or on the couch via multiple controllers.
